name: Lil' Cuties Dress Up Game for Girls - Street Fashion Style
name_original: Lil' Cuties Dress Up Game for Girls - Street Fashion Style
description:
Play dress up with the coolest street fashion doll around- Lil' Cuties Dress Up!

Get ready for dress up fashion doll fun with Lil' Cuties Dress Up! Adorable dollies are fully customizable so little girls can make dolls that look just like themselves. The doll's skin color, eye color, hair color and hair style are all up to you- and that's just the beginning! Oodles of dresses, shoes and accessories are included to make your lil' cutie the most fashionable on the block!

Street fashion is all the rage, and fashion-forward little girls will love these Harajuku-inspired outfits! Fancy frilly dresses, modern dresses and even sets of overalls go with tons of tights, pretty shoes and bodacious boots. Accessorize to the max with fun and funky eyewear, hats and hair flowers and clips, jewelry and strawberry purses. Girls can even pick out a cute friend for their dollie- maybe a silly succulent or a bright and happy balloon? Lots of cool backgrounds take your doll to faraway magical lands, with rainbows and chocolates and starry night skies!

Don't forget to give your new fashionista a name, and save a photo of her to your device!
For a fresh start and new outfit, tap the dice to generate an entirely new look- it's fun to mix things up!

Lil' Cuties Dress Up is the perfect paper doll app for little girls ages 3-7. All the outfits are bright and kid-friendly, and there are endless combinations for hours of free play fun!

Adorable doll art by Acrylicana <3


Features
-G-rated – the doll and clothing are appropriate for girls ages 3 and up.
-Includes over 20 dresses with tons of accessories and jewelry to try on, plus 8 friends and 12 illustrated backgrounds.
-Available in 6 languages: English, Spanish, German, Danish, Norwegian and Russian!
-Child-friendly!

Note for Parents
This app:
– Does not contain ads, popups or in-app purchases.
– Does not contain links to social networks or the internet.
– Does not use data collection tools.
– Does not require an internet connection to play.
– Does require the “Storage” permission to store pictures of the doll.

Please see our privacy policy for more information, http://privacy.lauratallardy.com.
